testCase.name: valid attr with various scalar fields
statements: CREATE STREAM input (k INT KEY, s STRING, i INT, bi BIGINT, d DOUBLE, bo BOOLEAN) WITH (kafka_topic='in', value_format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE out AS SELECT k, ATTR(s) AS s, ATTR(i) AS i, ATTR(bi) AS bi, ATTR(d) AS d, ATTR(bo) AS bo FROM input GROUP BY k;
